actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the alleviation of high ground-water conditions in and adjacent to the town of Moses Lake, Wash.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to design and construct drainage works to alleviate high groundwater conditions in and adjacent to Moses Lake, Washington.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the alleviation of high ground-water conditions in and adjacent to the town of Moses Lake, Wash.
